attributes.action: To demand the BBC report a balanced view of Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
Claiming Morgan Stanley relocating to Dublin after Brexit
Inciting the country towards hatred, divisiveness and hostility by constantly referring to the Brexit vote being made purely due to immigration. Since the beginning of the Referendum in the UK the BBC has continually reported the news in a biased fashion towards the Remain Campaign, and since the Brexit vote they continue to report a very divisive view of Brexit.
attributes.background:
For portraying Brexiters as uneducated, white and elderly racists
Suggesting reasons for Brexit are due to racial attitude
For lying about the effects of the Brexit vote
For biased reporting when they should have be politically neutral

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which includes complaints about the impartiality of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
